    • 方法详细资料

      • checkTargetTables

        private void checkTargetTables(TableName[] tTableArray,
                               boolean isOverwrite)
                        throws IOException
        Validate target tables.
        参数:
        tTableArray - target tables
        isOverwrite - overwrite existing table
        抛出:
        IOException - exception

      • restoreImages

        private void restoreImages(BackupManifest.BackupImage[] images,
                           TableName sTable,
                           TableName tTable,
                           boolean truncateIfExists)
                    throws IOException
        Restore operation handle each backupImage in array.
        参数:
        images - array BackupImage
        sTable - table to be restored
        tTable - table to be restored to
        truncateIfExists - truncate table
        抛出:
        IOException - exception

      • getFilesRecursively

                                                     throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                                            IOException
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException
        IOException

      • restore

        private void restore(HashMap<TableName,BackupManifest> backupManifestMap,
                     TableName[] sTableArray,
                     TableName[] tTableArray,
                     boolean isOverwrite)
              throws IOException
        Restore operation. Stage 2: resolved Backup Image dependency
        参数:
        backupManifestMap - : tableName, Manifest
        sTableArray - The array of tables to be restored
        tTableArray - The array of mapping tables to restore to
        抛出:
        IOException - exception
